content: कुब्ज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कु ईषत् उब्जमार्जंवं यत्र शकं° <ls>Tv.</ls>] Hump-backed, crooked. --ब्जः {@--1@} A curved sword. {@--2@} A hump on the back. --ब्जा A young female servant of Kaṃsa, said to be deformed in three parts of her body. [Kṛṣṇa and Balarāma, while proceeding to Mathurā, saw her on the high road carrying unguent to Kaṃsa. They asked her if she would give them some portion of it, and she gave as much as they wanted. Kṛṣṇa, being very much pleased with her kindness, made her perfectly straight, and she began to appear a most beautiful woman].
